attributes.action: I respectfully ask that our nation is called to have a National Day of Prayer
attributes.additional_details:
Our country, needs to take time to seek God and pray. We have always had a rich culture for prayer and fasting. After King George VI called for a day of fasting and prayer, the nation gathered together and prayed and fasted for 1 day, A MIRACLE TOOK PLACE. Instead of only 30,000 soldiers being rescued at Dunkirk in 1940, over 300,000 soldiers were rescued.
Covid-19 has ravaged our nation. We need to pray and fast to God for our nations recovery.
attributes.background:
In WW2 King George called our Nation to have a day of prayer and fasting. 2 Chronicles 7:14 
With Covid-19 Our health care, Jobs, Finances, People have all suffered. A national day of prayer would focus people to seek God for our Nations recovery. Only through God can this be done quickly.

rejection.details: This would be a matter for religious institutions, not the UK Government or Parliament.
